name: Explorer's Fire
flavorText: You enchant a fire so that it isn’t visible from more than a short  distance, in the hope that it won’t attract unwanted attention.
text: You alter one fire of bonfire size or smaller within 5 squares of you. Light cast by the fire cannot be seen from more than 5 squares from the fire. The fire’s light is unchanged within that radius, and the ritual does not diminish or contain the fire’s heat or sounds.
